frameDefinitions: Under some Condition, usually left implicit, a Duty needs to be fulfilled by a  Responsible_party.
A Behavior is classified as entrenched for a Protagonist or a Society.
Words in the frame refer to any Document that has a legal status or conventional social significance.
Under some Condition, usually left implicit, a Responsible_party is required to perform some Duty.
An single Subpart breaks off from a Whole.
A particular Binding_principle is (or is not) operative, that is, any obligations, restrictions, and any other aspects of the Binding_principle are (or are not) in effect.
frameExamples: It would <t>behoove</t> us to comprehend and personalize what Jesus had to tell his disciples
They got their marriage <t>licence</t> from Canada.
It is my <t>duty</t> to fight any attack on the Brotherhood .
The original sword may have <t>chipped</t> off of the statue long ago.
This law will only become in <t>effect</t> during the last three weeks of the year.
listRoleDefinitions: The action that the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is obligated to perform.
The person who must perform the <fen>Duty</fen>.
The time interval during which the <fen>Duty</fen> is mandatory.
A location in which the <fen>Duty</fen>  obtains.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate the entrenched <fen>Behavior</fen>.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate whose entrenched <fen>Behavior</fen> is at issue.
This role marks expressions that indicate a region where the <fen>Behavior</fen> is  entrenched.
The holder of the document.
The authority that issues the document.
Obligation is the obligation that is imposed on the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>.
Right is the right of the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>  that is authorized by the <fen>Document</fen>.
Status is the state of the Bearer of the Document indicated by the Document.
Document is the piece of paper that has the legal status.
The person who must perform the <fen>Duty</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is obligated to perform.
The time interval during which the Responsibly_party is obligated to fulfill the Duty.
A location in which the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> has a specified <fen>Duty</fen> .
The part of the <fen>Whole</fen> that is conceived as being broken or taken off from the remaining part of the whole.
The piece that is presented in a less prominent position, and which is the landmark or remaining whole from which <fen>Sub_part</fen> breaks off.
The time at which the breaking off of the <fen>Sub_part</fen> happens.
The location at which the breaking off occurs.
The <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is the law, contract, principle, or other (set of) obligations that is (or is not) operational.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is in effect.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is or is not operational.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Getting a shot against yellow fever</fex> is obligatory for travellers to Benin.
The use of TM software is obligatory <fex>for every freelance translator working on projects for our company</fex>.
<fex>These days</fex>, wearing a seat-belt is mandatory.
Gymnasium is not obligatory <fex>in Sweden</fex>, but nearly everyone attends gymnasium
<fex>His</fex> custom was to come here for the 10 o'clock service.

We can help , you to meet Egyptian people and learn about 
<fex>Egyptian</fex> customs.
They found that a loca custom <fex>in the country</fex> was to walk around barefoot at all times of the year and in all weathers .
<fex>My </fex> visa will expire next month.
<fex>US consulate</fex> issued a Visa to Ms. Yang to travel to San Francisco.
They were all under subpoena <fex>to appear in court.</fex>
Raymond has a <fex>fishing</fex> licence.
The couple just got their <fex>marriage</fex> certificate.
The police need a search <fex><t>warrant</t></fex> to enter his house.
<fex>Everyone</fex> has the obligation to vote.
My job is <fex>to get to the other side of the bridge</fex>.
<fex>At that time</fex> men were obligated to marry women from their own community.
I almost forgot to tell you that <fex>in Sweden</fex> we are obligated to spend atleast 7.5 months in the army for training.
The handle broke off of the pot.
The handle broke <fex>off of the pot</fex>.
Once <fex>the treaty</fex> is in effect, US port authorities and the Coast Guard will monitor compliance by checking any yacht 79 feet or longer.
All patent applicants and owners should be aware of the current uncertainty as to what patent fees will be in effect <fex>on October 1, 1998</fex>
This promotion is void <fex>in the state of Florida</fex>.
